trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that displays a document on a screen as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um controlador de impressão que apresenta um documento num ecrã como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Typically, to use the print preview feature, you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> class and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, utilizar a funcionalidade de pré-visualização, cria uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>classe e definir o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: The PreviewPrintController is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, though you can use the PreviewPrintController when managing the display of your own print preview window.
trans-unit.target: O PreviewPrintController é utilizado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>classes, embora, pode utilizar o PreviewPrintController gerir a apresentação da sua própria janela de pré-visualização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, performs the print preview, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> back to the original value.
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizado com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController define o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>de associada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, efetua a pré-visualização, conjuntos e as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>novamente para o valor original.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é apresentado durante a pré-visualização.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>denomina-se, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método apaga o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método deallocates o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a impressão, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Descrição geral do espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Captures the pages of a document as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Captura as páginas de um documento como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> image representation contained in a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> to implement your own print preview form.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>imagem representação contida num <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo>para implementar o seu próprio formulário de pré-visualização.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"></xref> that contains the pages of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"> </xref> que contém as páginas de uma <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this controller is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este controlador é utilizado para pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controlo que determina quando e como uma página no documento de impressão de pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>eventos.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, this method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se é emitida uma exceção no interior de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>eventos de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, não é possível chamar este método.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é apresentado durante a pré-visualização.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>denomina-se, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Limpa o método OnEndPage de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método deallocates o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento a ser pré-visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre como uma página no documento de impressão de pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controlo que determina quando e como um documento de impressão de pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado imediatamente após <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>eventos.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the print preview process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo que foi emitida uma excepção não identificada durante o processo de pré-visualização, OnEndPrint é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é apresentado durante a pré-visualização.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>denomina-se, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método apaga o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o método OnEndPrint deallocates o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento a ser pré-visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre como o documento de impressão de pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Começa a sequência de controlo que determina quando e como uma página no documento de impressão de pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>eventos.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é apresentado durante a pré-visualização.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>denomina-se, os conjuntos de método OnStartPage de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método apaga o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método deallocates o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, makes the print preview look better.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, também conhecido como dimensionamento cinzento, faz com que a pré-visualização, procure uma melhor.

trans-unit.source: However, the use of anti-aliasing can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a utilização de anti aliasing pode abrandar a velocidade de composição.

trans-unit.source: For more information about anti-aliasing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre o aliasing de antimalware, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento a ser pré-visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre como uma página no documento de impressão de pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade deste parâmetro será <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from this method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: O valor devolvido deste método será utilizado para definir esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que representa uma página de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Começa a sequência de controlo que determina quando e como um documento de impressão de pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>eventos.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é apresentado durante a pré-visualização.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Após OnStartPrint é designado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método apaga o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método deallocates o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint verifica se as definições de impressora são válidas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento a ser pré-visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre como imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora com o nome no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade não existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use anti-aliasing when displaying the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve utilizar o aliasing de anti quando se apresenta a pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, uses several shades of gray around areas of curves and diagonals in text to give the text a smoother appearance.
trans-unit.target: Anti aliasing, também conhecido como cinzento dimensionamento, utiliza várias shades de cinzento em torno de áreas de curvas e diagonals no texto para dar o texto um aspeto smoother.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > While using anti-aliasing makes the print preview look better, it can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Enquanto utilizar o aliasing de anti faz com que a pré-visualização parecer melhor, podem abrandar a velocidade de composição.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the print preview uses anti-aliasing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a pré-visualização utiliza anti-aliasing; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
